author: FARNOUSH AMIRI
title: Agenda languishing, Democrats press Biden to go it alone
description: PHILADELPHIA (AP) — Top Democrats are pleading for President Joe Biden to act alone on some of the party’s core legislative priorities, viewing executive action as their best hope of delivering on their promises and energizing liberal voters they worry are go…
